page.title: 07MR. SWAIN'S NURSERY
page.content: Mr. Swain owns a 2 acre nursery which sells plants and ornaments. On a busy day he can have up to 200 customers and on a bad day he wouldn't have any customers. He runs the nursery on his own with a few weekend helpers. There are 3 greenhouses where he propogates the plants. He works a 7 day week and doesn't get a real holiday apart from when he takes the children away for two weeks in the summer.His plants range in size and from a few pence to 15 pounds for a magnolia. He has small geraniums and big shrubs but he doesn't have a favourite plant. Most of his competition comes from Coventry. He had very strong feelings about the coal mine being on his doorstep because he thught that after what he had built up the coal mine wouldn't do him any good.
